1.name: Salinui chueok
1.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

2.name: Oldeuboi
2.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

3.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
3.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

4.name: Cold Mountain
4.description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

5.name: Bad Boys II
5.description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

6.name: Something's Gotta Give
6.description: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

7.name: Love Actually
7.description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

8.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
8.description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

9.name: Lost in Translation
9.description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

10.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
10.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

11.name: Monster
11.description: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

12.name: Old School
12.description: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

13.name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
13.description: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

14.name: The Room
14.description: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

15.name: The Dreamers
15.description: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

16.name: The Matrix Reloaded
16.description: Neo and his allies race against time before the machines discover the city of Zion and destroy it. While seeking the truth about the Matrix, Neo must save Trinity from a dark fate within his dreams.

17.name: Finding Nemo
17.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

18.name: Peter Pan
18.description: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

19.name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
19.description: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

20.name: Holes
20.description: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

21.name: Big Fish
21.description: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

22.name: The School of Rock
22.description: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn them into a rock band.

23.name: Mystic River
23.description: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

24.name: The Italian Job
24.description: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

25.name: It Runs in the Family
25.description: This is the story of a dysfunctional New York family, and their attempts to reconcile.

26.name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
26.description: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

27.name: The Last Samurai
27.description: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

28.name: The Matrix Revolutions
28.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

29.name: Underworld
29.description: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

30.name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
30.description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

31.name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
31.description: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

32.name: Hulk
32.description: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

33.name: Timeline
33.description: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in fourteenth century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.

34.name: Wrong Turn
34.description: Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by "cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding."

35.name: Identity
35.description: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

36.name: Bruce Almighty
36.description: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

37.name: X2
37.description: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

38.name: Dogville
38.description: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado town. In exchange, she agrees to work for them. As a search visits the town, she finds out that their support has a price. Yet her dangerous secret is never far away.

39.name: The Core
39.description: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

40.name: Thirteen
40.description: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

41.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
41.description: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

42.name: House of 1000 Corpses
42.description: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

43.name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
43.description: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

44.name: Secondhand Lions
44.description: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

45.name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
45.description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

46.name: The Cat in the Hat
46.description: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

47.name: Brother Bear
47.description: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

48.name: Cheaper by the Dozen
48.description: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

49.name: The Brown Bunny
49.description: Professional motorcycle racer Bud Clay heads from New Hampshire to California to race again. Along the way he meets various needy women who provide him with the cure to his own loneliness, but only a certain woman from his past will truly satisfy him.

50.name: Final Destination 2
50.description: When Kimberly has a violent premonition of a highway pileup she blocks the freeway, keeping a few others meant to die, safe...Or are they? The survivors mysteriously start dying and it's up to Kimberly to stop it before she's next.
